body:
Comment 1: 
This has been fixed with the most recent compiler changes. Please hg sync.

All of these compile w/o errors:

package main

func main() {
	_ = interface{}(true)
	_ = interface{}(42)
	_ = interface{}(3.1415)
	_ = interface{}("hello")
}
_Labels changed: added **compilerbug**._ _Status changed to **Fixed**._
